_comment: MOCK DATA FOR MVP - Replace with real data from SerpAPI/database later

attractions.name: Sensoji Temple
attractions.description: Historic Buddhist temple built in 645 AD
attractions.cultural_notes: Remove shoes, bow respectfully, avoid photos in inner sanctum

attractions.name: Tsukiji Outer Market
attractions.description: Famous fish market with street food and sushi vendors
attractions.cultural_notes: Respect working vendors, don't touch fish, queue properly

attractions.name: Fushimi Inari Shrine
attractions.description: Iconic shrine with thousands of red torii gates on hillside
attractions.cultural_notes: Best visited early morning to avoid crowds, donation appreciated

attractions.name: Gion Corner
attractions.description: Traditional geisha performance and cultural experiences
attractions.cultural_notes: Photography often restricted during performances, arrive early
